title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes all of the following criteria.

title: Part (b)i
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes two of the following criteria.

title: Part (b)ii
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note:

The kinetic energy must be nonnegative for all angles to earn this point.

A kinetic energy graph with a minimum of zero can still earn this point, though in this case the sphere could not actually complete a full circle in a finite amount of time.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes the following criteria.

title: Part (b)iii
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Correct answer: “Top half”

Note: If a wrong answer is given, the explanation is still graded for consistency with the graph in part (b)(ii)
descriptions:

Correct answer: “Top half”

Note: If a wrong answer is given, the explanation is still graded for consistency with the graph in part (b)(ii)

Correct answer: “Top half”
